a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Gross enrolment ratio in tertiary education, 1970 to 2022
Number of people of any age group who are enrolled in tertiary education expressed as a percentage of the total
population of the five-year age group following on from secondary school leaving.
Data source: UNESCO via World Bank
Note: Gross enrolment rate can surpass 100% when including students outside the official age due to early or late admissions and
